article_title: Investors want advisors to be more hands-on
article_text:
Photo: AP

Customers are changing the full-service investment advisory industry, says a new study, pushing advisors to become more hands-on but at the same time looking for a hybrid approach in which the advisor is more of a validator than a decision-maker.

Read: What's a small retirement account?

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marlene Y. Satter
article_metadata.description: Customers are changing the full-service investment advisory industry, says a new study from J.D. Power. Here's how.
